TopicTitle: "Launch a test rocket" forced restart even after reaching end goals

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: windows 10 | CPU: Intel i5 4690K | GPU: NVIDEA GTX 1070 | RAM: 16gb

 

In "Launch a test rocket," when crashing your rocket after going completing the required flight procedures, you have to restart and cannot go further, even though you have already met the flying goals.

This is not aligned with my expectations when Paige says something along the lines of: "Feel free to keep experimenting with the controls and continue when you're ready"

I think many people will keep 'experimenting' until they crash and then want to continue, but then they can't and have to restart the tutorial.

Included Attachments:
The video is from 0.1.4 but the 'bug' persists. I didn't get prompted to choose replay or leave, but I was instantly sent to the beginning of the tutorial.
KerbalSpaceProgram22023-09-0910-23-53.mp4

Bug still present in 0.1.5
